value:
Delthea has a vast store of untapped
potential but flatly refuses to invest
in her studies... I'm at my wits' end.

I studied magic in a secluded forest
village. I may not be very worldly, but
I'll manage... Somehow.

Feel free to consult me whenever
something is on your mind. That's
what friends are for. Isn't it?

I have devised a new spell. Would
you mind observing as I test it? I
value your opinion.

Have you seen Delthea? That girl is
always up to something. I'll need to
set her to rights...again.

Because we're all friends now, I
come bearing a friendly greeting
from $Nf.

Hmm... Something's changed!
Ah, I've thought up a new spell.
Splendid!

I'll never rise above average at
this rate...
Abysmal! Truly abysmal...

You're entrusting me with this?
Thank you. I will consider closely
how best to use it.

I'm Luthier, a mage from Zofia. Are
you the one who summoned me? If
so, I'd love to study your technique...

Oh, you've spotted me, have you?
What am I doing? Well, I'm observing
my fellow mages in the castle.$k$pAny good student requires a master,
and Askr is simply bursting at the
seams with powerful mages!$k$pIt's... Er, well, it's a little difficult to
find the right opportunity to approach
a potential tutor, however...$k$pWhat am I waiting for, you ask? It's
not that easy...$k$pYou probably find approaching a
stranger natural... I'd bet you have
two, or perhaps even THREE friends!$k$pWait a moment...you can ask on my
behalf! My plight has moved you, and
now you can rush to my aid. Go on!
たあっ
行け！
ぐっ…
この俺が…！
You're finished!
O great power!
Don't underestimate me.
Will this suffice?
Delthea...
ふっ…
I am Luthier, a student of magic. Pleased to meet you. (Yes, that sounds right...)
Whoa! Given the responsibility you wield, shouldn't you act a little more mature?
You must understand—there's a reason I joined up with the Deliverance. I owe Alm more than I can say.
My younger sister Delthea is a real handful. If you value your sanity, you'd best steer clear.
I must thank you for summoning me. I never would have imagined in I'd have the opportunity to study magic in another realm...
The world is larger than any of us could possibly comprehend... I must never stop learning.
You're more than just the summoner to me...you're my friend. Um... We ARE friends, right?
Oh, indeed.
Surely not?
I've trained for this!
